vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
interface IMinter {

    function transfer(address, uint256) external;
vulnerability_findings.message:
IMinter (IMinter.sol#8-10) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (IMinter.sol#9)

vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in IMinter.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.6.12', 'ABIEncoderV2']
	- IMinter.sol#5 declares pragma solidity0.6.12
	- IMinter.sol#6 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IMinter.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.6.12 (IMinter.sol#5): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '' of IMinter.transfer (IMinter.sol#9) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_scope_0' of IMinter.transfer (IMinter.sol#9) is not in mixedCase
